name: Monster Heart
summary:
Have you ever met a nice, cute monster in an rpg and just did not want to fight, but instead give it a big hug? Maybe take it home, bandage up its wounds, and then care for it like a pet? Welcome to Riddle Fox's next big game, Monster Heart!

Here you will wander the Candlebook Island Monster Sanctuary and care for all the wonderful beasts and monsters, and then relax after a hard days work with your coworkers.
